statements: UPDATE architectural_projects SET project_architect = 'John Doe' WHERE project_id = '12345';
UPDATE architectural_projects SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated description' WHERE project_id = '54321';
UPDATE architectural_projects SET project_architect = 'John Doe', project_year = 2022 WHERE project_id = '101'
UPDATE architectural_projects SET project_description = 'Renovated interior design', project_architect = 'Jane Smith' WHERE project_id = '203'
UPDATE projects SET project_name='Renovated Building', architect_name='John Doe' WHERE project_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE designs SET design_year=2022, designer_name='Alice Smith' WHERE design_id='54321-abcdef-65432-ghijkl';
UPDATE projects SET project_name = 'Renovated Building', architect_name = 'Jane Doe' WHERE project_id = 'c614e675-4378-4f06-a9a2-88a589d7c3c1';
UPDATE designs SET design_name = 'Modern Residence', design_description = 'A contemporary architectural design', designer_name = 'John Smith' WHERE design_id = '3d9b0bbe-1c45-4fd8-b525-8eb436ae1fd4';
UPDATE architectural_projects SET project_name='New Project Name', architect_name='New Architect Name' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE project_images SET image_url='http://example.com/new-image.jpg', image_description='Updated Image Description' WHERE image_id=2;
UPDATE architectural_projects SET project_description = 'New Project Description', architect_name = 'John Doe' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_images SET image_description = 'Beautiful image of the project', image_url = 'http://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Projects SET architect_name = 'John Doe' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Designs SET design_name = 'Modern Design', design_description = 'Sleek and minimalistic', design_image_url = 'www.example.com/modern-design.jpg' WHERE design_id = 2;
UPDATE Projects SET project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Architects SET architect_email = 'new_email@example.com', architect_phone = '123-456-7890' WHERE architect_id = 2;
UPDATE ArchitecturalProjects SET project_name = 'Renovated Library' WHERE project_id = 1
UPDATE ProjectImages SET image_description = 'Front view of the building' WHERE project_id = 1
UPDATE ArchitecturalProjects SET project_name = 'Renovated Office Building', completion_year = 2023 WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectTags SET tag_name = 'Modern Office', project_id = 1 WHERE tag_id = 1;
